name: A. Integer Points
statement:
DLS and JLS are bored with a Math lesson. In order to entertain
themselves, DLS took a sheet of paper and drew n distinct lines, given
by equations y = x + p_i for some distinct p_1, p_2,
ldots, p_n.Then JLS drew on the same paper sheet m distinct lines given
by equations y = -x + q_i for some distinct q_1, q_2,
ldots, q_m.DLS and JLS are interested in counting how many line pairs
have intersection points, i.e. points with both coordinates that are
integers. Unfortunately, the lesson will end up soon, so DLS and JLS are
asking for your help.
